title: 在创造模式下可以打开箱子
author: xRPQx
txt_content:
In every version of Minecraft Pocket Edition history, you are unable to open a chest in creative mode to access it’s items. That’s all going to change in the 0.14.0 update – You will be able to open, edit, add, or whatever you like to chests while still in Creative mode.
在以往任何一个版本的MinecraftPE中,你都不能打开箱子——在你创造模式的时候。但是0.14.0更新会改变的,你将能够打开、编辑、添加任何物品到箱子里——当然将会在创造模式里。

This will be a game changer for map creators who are weary of always switching gamemode to survival, in order to complete their adventure maps for the large Minecraft PE community.
对地图制作者来说，这将是一个改变游戏规则的更新。他们厌倦总是调模式转向生存,因为他们制作地图需要用到箱子。



Stay tuned for more upcoming news on the 0.14.0 update!
请继续关注更多的、即将到来的关于新版本的消息！


http://mcpenews.com/edit-creative-mode-chests-0-14-0/
